settings.subheading: Use it to set your brand's tone and create a first impression with your customers. Vibrant imagery with a lot of background accent works well for a full-screen effect.

settings.text:
Over the years, we’ve been trying to come up with the best way to say, “Hello, we’re Neptune, and this is who we are.” It’s easy to learn that we’re an interiors brand – our stores and our website will tell you that in no time. But while our designs are a huge part of who we are, ‘the why’ and ‘the how’ almost matter more than ‘the what’. It’s easy to tell you what we do, it’s harder to explain why. That’s where our philosophy, a different perspective, comes in. Three words that sum up our entire reason for being.

We’re optimists. Relentless ones. At Neptune, we fundamentally believe that things can always be better. That’s our starting point. In everything that we do, from how we design a table to how we approach our delivery service, if there’s a way to improve things for you, rest assured we’ll do it. We’ll never be different for the sake of saying so. But we’ll always go against the grain if it’s going to make your life better.

settings.title: A different perspective, part one
settings.subheading: Perfect imperfection – self-proclaimed perfectionists we might be, but we want to design homes that are living and breathing, creating pieces that’ll age gracefully, and embracing the beauty in imperfection.

settings.title: A different perspective, part two
settings.subheading: Tradition & innovation – while we’ll always have one foot in the past, calling on antiques for inspiration and traditional making methods for their dependability, we also embrace the cutting edge.

settings.title: A different perspective, part three
settings.subheading: Edited choice – plenty of options so there’s something for (just about) every home, but not so much that things become overwhelming, that’s how we approach all our collections, including our paint colours.

settings.title: A different perspective, part four
settings.subheading: Timelessness – more than anything, we want the pieces you buy from us to last the course so, in the years or even generations to come, they’ll continue to look (and act) the part.

settings.title: A different perspective, part five
settings.subheading: Home from home – when we first decided to open stores, we decided they wouldn’t be just places to shop but rather places to feel well and truly at home. And they still do, thirty-odd stores later.

settings.title: Stories of us
settings.subheading: Our founders on what we stand for, why we do things the way we do, and how ‘a different perspective’ has found its way into each and every part of Neptune.
